name: Puzzle Game!
description:
A puzzle game where you have to pick up a key, drag boxes to buttons, or block enemies that get in your way. It is a short and fast game more fun to play when you are bored.

highly recommended to read before playing:

Use W,A,S,D to walk and as drag boxes.

use R to restart the level.

Mini Tutorial: To pass the level you have to pick up a key and with this will have several obstacles that prevent you from doing this task, for this you use boxes that you can drag to press buttons and also block enemies. There are two types of boxes one common and one iron, the common boxes blocks small enemies and also presses the buttons, the iron one does the same as the common, in addition to blocking larger enemies.

all the arts were made by the following people:

  1. https://o-lobster.itch.io/
  2. https://pixel-poem.itch.io/
  3. https://lazy-fox.itch.io/
  4. https://sfxr.me/
